abstract: Archie Comics, in spring 2012, will bring back its line of superhero characters in digital subscription model; users will also have access to original stories and archive of past material.
snippet: In spring, the company will bring back its line of superhero characters in a digital subscription model offering original stories and access to an archive of past adventures.
lead_paragraph: In spring, the company will bring back its line of superhero characters in a digital subscription model offering original stories and access to an archive of past adventures.

headline.main: For Archie Comics, a Return to Superheroes
headline.print_headline: For Archie Comics, a Return to Superheroes
headline.seo: For Archie Comics, a Return to Superheroes
